trans-unit.source: Converts <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> objects from one type to another.
Most commonly, the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeFConverter> type converter is used to convert <xref:System.Drawing.Font> instances to and from their corresponding string representations.
Access the <xref:System.Drawing.FontConverter> class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert from the type specified to the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type, using the specified context.
If the specified type is a <xref:System.String>, this method will always return `true`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> the represents the type you wish to convert from.
`true` to indicate the conversion can be performed; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type you want to convert from.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion otherwise, `false`.
Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref>.
If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert the value parameter to.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> with the specified property values using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> containing property names and values.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the new <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref>, or `null` if the object cannot be created.
Returns a value indicating whether changing a value on this object requires a call to the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeFConverter.CreateInstance*"></xref> method to create a new value.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
This may be `null`.
Always returns `true`.
Retrieves a set of properties for the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type using the specified context and attributes.
This method always returns the properties of a <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> type regardless of the `value` parameter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to return properties for.
An array of <xref href="System.Attribute"></xref> objects that describe the properties.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the properties.
Returns whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> type supports properties.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> through which additional context can be supplied.
Always returns `true`.
